Description: Bronze weight, filled with lead, in the form of a seated cow; chevron pattern along backbone; corroded .
Curator's comments: On LC weights and weight systems: Petruso K. 1984, 'Prolegomena to Late Cypriot weight metrology', AJA 88/3, 293-304; Courtois J.-C. 1984, 'Le trésor de poids de Kalavasos- Ayios Dhimitrios, 1982', RDAC, 117-30.
Bibliographic references: Bronze / Catalogue of the Bronzes in the British Museum. Greek, Roman & Etruscan. (3195)
Catling 1964 / Cypriot Bronzework in the Mycenaean World (p.251)
